author: John Mauro
description:
The second season of Solo Leveling, subtitled Arise from the Shadow, has all the makings of a grimdark anime classic. Based on a Korean web novel of the same name, Solo Leveling takes place in a modern South Korea where portals to monster-infested dungeons appear, threatening to overrun humankind if they are left unchecked. In […]

The post REVIEW: Solo Leveling Season Two appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Solo Leveling Season Two
